title: In the Clear Moonlit Dusk, Vol. 1
description: I'M PAINFULLY AWARE I'M MORE HERO THAN HEROINEYoi Takiguchi's long legs, deep voice, and handsome face are the perfect recipe for an attractive guyâ€”until people realize she is, in fact, a girl. Dubbed a "prince" by her peers since childhood, Yoi has all but given up on being seen as anything else. That is, until she bumps into Ichimura-sempai, the school's other prince (who's a he) and gets a taste of what it feels like to be seen for her true self. The story of the two high school princes starts here!
author: Mika Yamamori
